LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_UP: Walk Upwards. Double tap to Dodge.
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_DOWN: Walk Downwards. Double tap to Dodge.
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_LEFT: Walk Left. Double tap to Dash.
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_RIGHT: Walk Right. Double tap to Dash.
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_F2: Triggers your Super Special (costs 8 Fury Gems)
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_F3: Used to perform Chain Combos and Special Input Commands.
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_F4: Secondary Weapon attack (when equipped) (Drains Weapon Gauge)
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_R1: Grabs enemies and picks up items.
LANG_BUTTONLAYOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG_L2: Time correctly to parry/counter enemy attacks.
LANG_MOVELIST_KEY_01: Key: ... ~Delay Input until Red Flash   ( ) ~Hold button   + ~Press Buttons together
LANG_MOVELIST_KEY_02: Note: Inputs are for Character facing Right
LANG_MOVELIST_FURYSPECIALS_DESCRIPTION: Fury Specials cost 4 Fury Gems to perform.
LANG_MOVELIST_PICKUPTOUNLOCK: Pick up weapon to unlock movelist
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_PARRY: Parry an Attack (+10% Damage per Parry Chain)
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_AIRRECOVERY: Attempt an AIR RECOVERY when being Juggled
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_FURYTRANSFORM: Transform into your Fury State (Costs 8 Fury Gems)
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_FURYBURST_02: Fury Burst. Break free when under attack.
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_RASETSU_EQUIP: All Attacks break Armour more easily
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_RASETSU_CHARGE: Charged Fire Tornado (Cancel at any point of Basic Chain)
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_MOMIJI_GUST: Gusts of Wind. Breaks armour with ease.
LANG_MOVELIST_HERO_MOMIJI_TYPHOON: Momiji Typhoon. Great for crowd control
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_PARRY: Parry an Attack (+10% Damage per Parry Chain)
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_AIRRECOVERY: Attempt an AIR RECOVERY when being Juggled
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_FURYTRANSFORM: Transform into your FURY STATE (Costs 8 Fury Gems)
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_FURYBURST_02: Fury Burst. Break free when under attack.
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_JUMPKUNAI: Jumping Kunai. Adjust angle by holding
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_BOMB_JUMPBOMBTOSS: Jumping Bomb Toss. Adjust angle by holding
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_GREENSTAR_CHARGED_02: Max Charged Green Star. Tap to add hits
LANG_MOVELIST_BABY_BOOMERANG_EQUIP: Enhances Chain 1 (Can be steered up or down)
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_PARRY: Parry an Attack (+10% Damage per Parry Chain)
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_GRAB: Grab Enemy (Hold direction to control) / Pickup Item
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_SLAM: Ground Slam (Move Enemy higher for more Damage)
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_AIRRECOVERY: Attempt an AIR RECOVERY when being Juggled
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_SUPER_02: Can be steered Up or Down
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_FURYTRANSFORM: Transform into your FURY STATE (Costs 8 Fury Gems)
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_FURYBURST_02: Fury Burst. Break free when under attack.
LANG_MOVELIST_JAZZ_MORBIDSTAR_EQUIP: All Attacks break Armour more easily
LANG_MOVELIST_AROS_PARRY: Parry an Attack (+10% Damage per Parry Chain)
LANG_MOVELIST_AROS_AIRRECOVERY: Attempt an AIR RECOVERY when being Juggled
LANG_MOVELIST_AROS_FURYTRANSFORM: Transform into your FURY STATE (Costs 8 Fury Gems)
LANG_MOVELIST_AROS_FURYBURST_02: Fury Burst. Break free when under attack.
LANG_MOVELIST_AROS_SYMBIOTE_CHAIN: Basic Chain that pulls Enemies in.
LANG_CUT_SH_TUTORIAL_01_BABY: That's right you better run and warn your pals!
LANG_CUT_SH_TUTORIAL_05_HERO: master Ramen is waiting for us.
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_INTRO_01: Ahh, I see you've warmed up with your Basic Attack Chains.
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_INTRO_03: However, a warrior keeps their focus in the heat of combat, waiting for the perfect moment to strike!
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_INTRO_05: #During any Chain, delay your next input until you see an Electric Aura on your character.
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_INTRO_06: Hyper Chains are enhanced versions of Regular Chains, and may have additional properties, damage and hits.
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_INTRO_07: Try them out against some Training Dummies.
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_OUTRO_01: Excellent, you've Unlocked a new Special Attack!
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_OUTRO_02: #Keep collecting Scrolls dropped by Emaki Ninja to Level Up you character!
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_OUTRO_03: Special Attacks can be done at any point during a Regular or Hyper Chain.
LANG_CUT_SH_RAMENHUT_OUTRO_04: #Use them often to keep the advantage!
LANG_CUT_SH_VILLAGE_INTRO_02: #Performing a Parry, right before your Enemy Strikes, will perform a Counter Attack.
LANG_CUT_SH_VILLAGE_INTRO_04: #A powerful multi hit Attack, that can be cancelled into Parry, Chains, Specials, Dash or Jump.
LANG_CUT_SH_VILLAGE_INTRO_06: #For each successful Parry, you gain a 10% Damage Bonus.
LANG_CUT_SH_SPACESHIP_01: On your journey you'll find Mighty Allies ready to Assist you.
LANG_CUT_SH_SPACESHIP_02: Get your First Assist by Destroying the Chest!
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJOENTRANCE_INTRO_01: That's it! Kick those Emaki back to where they came from!
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJOENTRANCE_INTRO_02: Open the Ryugami Chest to receive your First Secondary Weapon.
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJOENTRANCE_INTRO_04: #These allow you to perform Powerful Attacks at the Cost of draining your Weapon Gauge.
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJOENTRANCE_INTRO_05: Weapons Randomly spawn throughout stages by destroying Objects, or from certain Enemies.
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJOENTRANCE_OUTRO_02: #Remember to use your Weapons often to defeat Enemies quickly!
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJOENTRANCE_OUTRO_03: Equipping Weapons also Enhances your characters in different ways. #Check your character's Pause Menu Movelist to see what they are.
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJO_INTRO_01_HERO: I guess this is the Emaki Ninja hideout.
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJO_OUTRO_01_JAZZ: I saw this in a kung-fu movie once,
LANG_CUT_SH_DOJO_OUTRO_02_JAZZ: #I think there might be a tall basketball player in his shorts upstairs.
LANG_CUT_SH_BOSS_INTRO_01: It seems you have stumbled into an Emaki mosh pit!
LANG_CUT_NB_STREETS_01_HERO: Master Ramen told us that these streets are ruled by dangerous gangsters called the Yakuzo.
LANG_CUT_NB_STREETS_02_BABY: Well let's make them an offer they can't refuse.
LANG_CUT_NB_ARCADE_01_BABY: It seems like those shady rats are in here as well.
LANG_CUT_NB_ARCADE_02_JAZZ: Maybe we can beat some coins out of them!
LANG_CUT_NB_ELEVATOR_03_BABY: #Beating you up while we're going down!
LANG_CUT_NB_HALLWAY_INTRO_01_HERO: This must be the hallway that leads to the big chief.
LANG_CUT_NB_HALLWAY_INTRO_02_BABY: Let's not forget to tip the cleaning ladies when we're done.
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_INTRO_01_KEN: Ey what's the maddah with you!?
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_INTRO_03_KEN: I was just writing a ransom letter for the mayor of Metro City.
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_INTRO_08_KEN: or I'll have some wise guys come in and whack yous,
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_INTRO_10_BABY: So you wanna play tough huh?
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_LIGHTSOUT_01_KEN: EY!? Who turned off the lights?
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_LIGHTSOUT_02_KEN: #Did I forget to pay the bills this month?
LANG_CUT_NB_OFFICE_OUTRO_02_ORIGAMI: #I'll teach you not to interfere with my plans!
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_03_JAZZ: What kind of sorcery is this?
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_05_DASH: look what crawled out of the woodwork.
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_11_DASH: #I thought you would be happy to see me!
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_12_DASH: Don't you appreciate the fireworks that I created?
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_13_HERO: You betrayed our clan and killed my father...
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_15_DASH: still whining after so many centuries?
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_16_DASH: You never understood the way of the ninja!
LANG_CUT_NB_YAMAGIWAVILLAGE_17_BABY: I don't know who you are pal but you're messing with the wrong team!
LANG_CUT_PB_BEACH_01_JAZZ: Yoho yoho a pirate life for me!
LANG_CUT_PB_BEACH_04_AROS: #We vikings are the true rulers of the sea!
LANG_CUT_PB_GALLEON_02_AROS: Feel's nice to be on a ship again!
LANG_CUT_PB_GALLEON_03_HERO: Master Ramen told me the captain knows more about the whereabouts of the Kusanagi Stone.
LANG_CUT_PB_GALLEON_04_JAZZ: Another henchmen of that red floating wizard dude?
LANG_CUT_PB_BOSS_01_BABY: I have a bad feeling about this...
LANG_CUT_PB_BOSS_06_BALTHAZAR: Ya darn right I'm the bloody cap'n ya froglegs!
LANG_CUT_PB_BOSS_07_BALTHAZAR: #No one enters me ship without me permission!
LANG_CUT_PB_BOSS_08_BABY: We're not here for parley you bloated meatball!
LANG_CUT_PB_BOSS_10_BALTHAZAR: #Don't ye know I was voted most sexy pirate of the year!?
LANG_CUT_CH_GRAVEYARD_03_BABY: #That's so gross I can't stand zombies!
LANG_CUT_CH_GRAVEYARD_04_AROS: If I knew there were going to be zombies,
LANG_CUT_CH_GRAVEYARD_05_AROS: I would have brought my chainsaw.
LANG_CUT_CH_GRAVEYARD_06_JAZZ: Let's kill 'em before they start dancing!
LANG_CUT_CH_BRIDGE_INTRO_04_AROS: #Nothing better than the sound of breaking bones in the morning!
LANG_CUT_CH_BRIDGE_OUTRO_02_HERO: And kick them in the face!
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_03_RAVEN: I didn't expect you to come this far already...
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_04_JAZZ: I know that voice from somewhere.
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_06_RAVEN: I see you're still a bit green!
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_07_HERO: Do you know this old geezer Jazz?
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_09_JAZZ: He was one of the wizards that used to be on my side,
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_10_JAZZ: but he decided to choose the path of darkness.
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_12_RAVEN: but I have powers that you can only dream of given by my master.
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_14_JAZZ: #I have a few tricks on my own!
LANG_CUT_CH_DUNGEON_15_RAVEN: Let's see how far you can come!
LANG_CUT_CH_TOWER_01_RAVEN: So you've made it this far.
LANG_CUT_CH_TOWER_02_BABY: Well what did you expect birdbrain.
LANG_CUT_CH_TOWER_03_RAVEN: You puny little maggots will never be able to defeat me.
LANG_CUT_CH_TOWER_04_RAVEN: #Now witness the power of a true warlock!
LANG_CUT_CH_TOWER_05_JAZZ: You're arrogance will be your downfall.
LANG_CUT_INF_LOCOMOTIVE_INTRO_03_JAZZ: There should be a train around here somewhere that could bring us to the other side.
LANG_CUT_INF_LOCOMOTIVE_INTRO_04_BABY: Well it certainly seems like we're on the right track.
LANG_CUT_INF_TRAINCRASH_INTRO_01_JAZZ: Now that's what I call an entrance!
LANG_CUT_INF_INNERCAVE_01_VIPER: I wasssss expecting you Jitssssu Squad.
LANG_CUT_INF_INNERCAVE_02_JAZZ: I hear a tire deflating or something.
LANG_CUT_INF_INNERCAVE_04_VIPER: #How dare you come into my lair!?
LANG_CUT_INF_INNERCAVE_05_VIPER: You are looking for the kusssanagi ssssstone are you not?
LANG_CUT_INF_INNERCAVE_06_VIPER: Masster Origami ordered me to desssstroy you.
LANG_CUT_INF_INNERCAVE_12_AROS: I'll make a nice belt out of you!
LANG_CUT_FF_FROZENROAD_01_JAZZ: Whew someone must have left the fridge open!
LANG_CUT_FF_FROZENROAD_03_HERO: we better start moving or we'll freeze to death.
LANG_CUT_FF_ENTRANCE_INTRO_01_BABY: What's this a suprise birthday party?
LANG_CUT_FF_ENTRANCE_INTRO_03_FROST: you must be the infamous #Jitsu Squad!
LANG_CUT_FF_ENTRANCE_INTRO_04_FROST: I've heard some rumors #about your silly quest #to find the Kusanagi stone.
LANG_CUT_FF_ENTRANCE_INTRO_08_HERO: Let's finish these puppies and follow after him!
LANG_CUT_FF_HALLWAY_01_BABY: That beefhead kittycat must be up ahead.
LANG_CUT_FF_HALLWAY_02_AROS: There's only room for one beefhead in this town and that's ME!
LANG_CUT_FF_THRONEROOM_01_FROST: It seems my stormwolves #have failed me.
LANG_CUT_FF_THRONEROOM_02_JAZZ: Yeah we made slushpuppies out of 'em!
LANG_CUT_FF_THRONEROOM_04_FROST: That means that I have the pleasure of crushing you #myself!
LANG_CUT_PR_JUNGLE_02_BABY: don't tell me there are cadillacs too.
LANG_CUT_PR_JUNGLE_03_AROS: I've never had dinosaur stew before.
LANG_CUT_PR_JUNGLE_06_HERO: I bet they want to try out some Jitsu Squad soup of the day as well.
LANG_CUT_PR_TARSANDS_01_HERO: Seems like we've stumbled upon a graveyard of some sorts.
LANG_CUT_PR_TARSANDS_02_BABY: You can call it whatever you want,
LANG_CUT_PR_TARSANDS_04_JAZZ: There's a bad vibe hanging around in this place,
LANG_CUT_PR_TARSANDS_05_JAZZ: I can feel it in my 'fro.
LANG_CUT_PR_TARSANDS_07_AROS: I had a booger that I needed to get rid off.
LANG_CUT_PR_NEST_04_JAZZ: did someone pack some bug spray by any chance?
LANG_CUT_PR_NEST_05_AROS: Sorry I left it with my toothbrush!
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_1ST_05_SHADE: the old man is ours now.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_1ST_08_SHADE: you have to go through me first.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_2ND_01_HERO: What have you done with Master Ramen?
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_2ND_02_SHADE: Don't worry Our lord Origami will take good care of him.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_2ND_03_AROS: We'll make you pay for this!
LANG_CUT_ROR_DEMONLAKE_01_JAZZ: I can feel a dark presence in this area,
LANG_CUT_ROR_DEMONLAKE_02_JAZZ: something truly evil must be near.
LANG_CUT_ROR_DEMONLAKE_04_HERO: Master Ramen is in danger. Let's hurry!
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_FINAL_02_SHADE: I don't intend on running anymore.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_FINAL_03_SHADE: #I am planning to finish you right here right now.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_FINAL_04_SHADE: Tonight I will feast on your souls!
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_DEFEAT_03_HERO: Dash!? What did you do to Master Ramen?
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_DEFEAT_04_DASH: You'll be seeing him in the afterlife very soon.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_DEFEAT_08_ORIGAMI: You've got some nerves messing with my plans.
LANG_CUT_ROR_BOSS_DEFEAT_09_ORIGAMI: I am Origami, destroyer of worlds, lord of darkness...
LANG_CUT_TC_BOSS_DEFEAT_02_RAMEN: Don't worry about me! We have to get the Kusanagi Stone before the portal closes.
LANG_POPUPTUTORIAL_DASHING_01: Double Tap any direction to dash.
LANG_POPUPTUTORIAL_ATTACKING_01: Perform Chain Attacks by rapidly pressing
LANG_POPUPTUTORIAL_GRABBING_01: Grab allows you to break through armour.
LANG_POPUPTUTORIAL_GRABBING_02: Note that some Enemies and bosses can't be grabbed.
LANG_POPUPTUTORIAL_HYPERCHAINS_01: Perform a Hyper Chain by pressing
LANG_POPUPTUTORIAL_ASSIST_01: Activate an Assist by picking it up with
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_MOVELIST_01: Your Warriors have a wide variety of
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_MOVELIST_02: attacks to cut down their opponents.
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_MOVELIST_05: Command List to view your attacks.
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_WEAPONS_03: Pick them up using either the
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_ASSIST_01: Throughout your journey you will find
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_ASSIST_02: many Allies ready to assist you.
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_ASSIST_03: Summon them by picking them up with
LANG_INFOMENU_RAMEN_PORTALS_01: It seems the Realm of Rogue can now
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_01_RAMEN: This is the story of a legendary statue called the Kusanagi Stone...
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_02_RAMEN: A hidden stone containing the soul of a powerful demon.
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_03_RAMEN: Now a wicked sorcerer called Origami has summoned ancient warriors in order to find him the stone...
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_04_RAMEN: Using my own mystic powers, I managed to save four souls from his calamity!
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_05_RAMEN: Who can grant godly powers to those who awaken him.
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_06_RAMEN: As a reward, he promises them endless power.
LANG_ANIMCUT_INTRO_08_RAMEN: together they are... THE JITSU SQUAD!!
LANG_ANIMCUT_SHBOSS_02_HERO: And teach them not to mess with the Jitsu Squad!
LANG_ANIMCUT_SHBOSS_03_AROS: Just one scrawny little ninja? What is this easy mode?
LANG_ANIMCUT_NBARCADE_01_JAZZ: Any punks left in stinking place?
LANG_ANIMCUT_NBARCADE_02_HERO: Maybe the've all gone home to put some more grease in their hair.
LANG_ANIMCUT_NBARCADE_03_BABY: Hey look! They have an arcade in here!
LANG_ANIMCUT_PBGALLEON_02_SAILOR: It seems that the Jitsu Squad is heading towards our ship.
LANG_ANIMCUT_PBGALLEON_03_BALTHAZAR: Oh!? Let me take a look at them scabby seabass.
LANG_ANIMCUT_PBGALLEON_05_BALTHAZAR: I see them rotten bunch of barnacle beef babies!
LANG_ANIMCUT_PBGALLEON_06_SAILOR: Do you want me to shoot 'em down sir?
LANG_ANIMCUT_PBGALLEON_08_BALTHAZAR: And I will squash them with me bare butt cheeks!
LANG_ANIMCUT_INFTRAINCRASH_02_BABY: Why is the train going so fast?
LANG_ANIMCUT_INFTRAINCRASH_05_RADIO: Oooh, let me be your ninja girl!
LANG_ANIMCUT_INFSURFING_01_VIPER: I can't believe you really beat me...
LANG_ANIMCUT_INFSURFING_03_AROS: Now tell us the location of the Kusanagi Stone!
LANG_ANIMCUT_INFSURFING_05_VIPER: If I'm going down, then I'm taking you with me!
LANG_ANIMCUT_INFSURFING_06_VIPER: I'll blow this cave to bits!!
LANG_ANIMCUT_FFENTRANCE_01_JAZZ: So that must be Frostjaw Fortress...
LANG_ANIMCUT_FFENTRANCE_02_BABY: I've heard some scary stories about that place...
LANG_ANIMCUT_FFENTRANCE_04_HERO: Cool it with the puns guys, let's kick some ass.
LANG_ANIMCUT_RORPRELUDE_01_ORIGAMI: I can't believe they've come this far already!
LANG_ANIMCUT_RORPRELUDE_02_ORIGAMI: You are all nothing but weaklings!!
LANG_ANIMCUT_RORPRELUDE_03_ORIGAMI: My patience is running out Shade.
LANG_ANIMCUT_RORPRELUDE_04_SHADE: Leave it all up to me your highness...
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_02_JAZZ: The legendary Kusanagi Stone! It's right here in front of us!
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_03_RAMEN: This time I'll seal it, and hide it in a place where no one can ever find it again!
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_05_RAMEN: And that my dear players, is how this story has come to an end.
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_06_RAMEN: Justice has prevailed and the Jitsu Squad has saved the day.
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_07_RAMEN: As for me...well.. it's been a long day and I really need my old man nap.
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_08_RAMEN: And with the Kusanagi Stone hidden in a place where no one can find it...
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_09_RAMEN: I can rest my head and end this story by wishing you a good night.
LANG_ANIMCUT_ENDING_10_RAMEN: See you in the next adventure!
